It looks like the watchdog is resetting your ESP because your loop takes too long. This is done to avoid being stuck in endless loops and can happen when you perform lenghty tasks which block the loop for several seconds. I assume that Firebase begin takes too long to connect, especially because you do not check if you are already connected to the wifi before you call it.

Usually, you can solve this problem by making sure that your loop is not blocked for extend time periods. I would suggest you change your code to something like this:
